plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 04-1656

                         UNITED STATES,

                           Appellee,

                               v.

                         LUIS MERCADO,

                     Defendant, Appellant.


                             ERRATA




     The opinion of this court issued on June 16, 2005 is amended
as follows:

     On page 16, line 6, “incorrect” should be “correct.”
